channel.title: Help with downloading cache?
channel.description:
Okay hey everyone, thanks for reading. So today I followed this tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,474572.0/topicseen.html as well as using the client suggested in the tut here:- http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,473061.0.html
My problem is, I don't know how to make it download the cache, nor what cache to use. The webclient works perfectly (found here:- http://www.knightsofdragon.com/webclient/webclient.php)
So yeah, all in all, can somebody please help me with the whole cache issue, thankyou.

item.title: Help with downloading cache?
item.dc:creator: @Lollyback Lollyback
item.description:
@Lollyback wrote:

I have the dropbox thing under control, but I really have NO idea what to do…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with downloading cache?
item.dc:creator: @mrdrzj mrdrzj
item.description:
@mrdrzj wrote:

First of all select all of your cache files and zip them, then go to www.dropbox.com and go to Public Folder (You first need to create an account if you dont have) and then you need to add an AutoCacheDownloader to your server, and use the Public Link from the cache.zip you uploaded (you put that link on the AutoCacheDownloader url) and it should work.
Good luck

Read full topic

well you have to rejar your files and try again also can you help me with somthing i need help making my webclient run without run-server.bat thing help me back if you can ;D
